author: wrowe
msg: A very rough starting point... these project files for win32 presume that
httpd-2.0 with srclib/apr and srclib/apr-util are sitting parallel to the
httpd-test directory.  Not terrific, but passable for now.

author: jwoolley
msg: Why the stack buffer and the copy?  This seems much more straightforward.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: mod_bucketeer needs to preserve error buckets if it sees them rather

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Let the error bucket implement the simple copy routine.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add macro to check for an error bucket.  (Can't call it APR_BUCKET_IS_ERROR
since error bucket is private to httpd - hence the AP_ prefix.)
